root.name: Pacific Fighters
root.description: OverviewPacific Fighters is an air combat simulation based on the major battles in the Pacific during World War II. Aircraft ranging from the versatile F4U Corsair to the nimble A6M Zero can be flown over the battlefields of Guadalcanal, Tarawa, Iwo Jima and Okinawa. CampaignAs in previous Il-2 Sturmovik titles, Pacific Fighters features a dynamic campaign. The player can select which military to fight for (U.S Army Air Force, Imperial Japanese Navy etc.) and which battle to fight in. Missions in the campaign are randomly generated, and most of the time you will see the same briefing as well as similar flight paths and aircraft loadouts.
